description:
Steps to reproduce:

1) Ensure all nova-compute services are disabled, but nova-scheduler and nova-api are enabled. http://paste.openstack.org/show/1604/

2) Create a VM. http://paste.openstack.org/show/1605/

3) View scheduler errors in logs. http://paste.openstack.org/show/1606/

4) Bring up a compute node and enable in services list.

5) The server is never built, but new servers can be created. The original VM will be stuck in a perpetual BUILD state, cannot be recovered, and must be deleted.
title: Create a server with no nova-compute services running
